name: Glowish
description:
** From the creators of the brain trainers Brainful, Color Magnet and Super Flip Game! **

Glowish is a puzzle game like no other! Beautifully designed and a truly brain challenger, Glowish will give you countless hours of enjoyment solving lots of colorful puzzles by turning light switches on and off!

Pay attention to the shapes and colors in each puzzle. When you touch a light switch, all the others that share the same color or shape will toggle. If you get stuck, use hints to light up the way.

Discover all the amazing puzzles and get engaged with this addictive and mind-blowing concept!


• 100 PUZZLES AND MUCH MORE
From simple to extremely complex difficulty, create your own strategies to solve all the 100 puzzles. If you’re still eager for more, play the random generated puzzles for an endless experience.

• 8 AMAZING COLOR THEMES
Try beautiful color combinations, from darker to lighter themes and play with your favourite one!

• RELAXING AMBIENCE
Have a relaxing experience to the sound of a soothing music.

• COLOR BLIND MODE
Specially conceived for color blind people, a practical way of perceiving colors through simple symbols.

• ACHIEVEMENTS
Unlock lots of achievements!


Glowish is one of a kind and a must-play.
